alert.note: Alert for La Plata (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued July 27 at 7:06PM MDT until July 28 at 1:00AM MDT by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 1015 PM MDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Urban and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of southwest Colorado, including the following county, La Plata. * WHEN...Until 1015 PM MDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 706 PM MDT, satellite estimates indicate heavy rain from thunderstorms in the advisory area. This will cause urban and small stream flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Falfa.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
